snippet: Joseph Saccente drove through several lawns and struck multiple mailboxes before crashing into the living room of a house in West Sayville, N.Y.
abstract: Suffolk County Police on Long Island say Joseph Saccente, 92-year-old taxi driver from West Sayville, NY, lost control of his vehicle and died crashing into home in neighboring Oakdale; he had no passengers at time of accident, and one witness said he was clutching his chest.
lead_paragraph: Joseph Saccente drove through several lawns and struck multiple mailboxes before crashing into the living room of a house in West Sayville, N.Y.

headline.main: Taxi Driver, 92, Crashes Into Long Island Home and Is Killed
headline.print_headline: Taxi Driver, 92, Crashes Into L.I. Home and Is Killed
